jobDescription: Advance your Human Resources career at Liberty Mutual Insurance- A Fortune 100 Company!Summary:It is an exciting time for Diversity & Inclusion at Liberty Mutual Insurance. Diversity and inclusion play an important role because they are directly tied to engagement, innovation and market competitiveness. For us to continue to succeed in the global marketplace, we must attract and retain the right skills and the best, most diverse, talent.
